hero.title: Smart money for smart cities
hero.subtitle: Flux empowers cities to raise money easily, shops to do business faster, and people to invest in their community.

munidollarsAbout.title: Munidollars
paragraphs: Munidollars are a new form of money that's smart, fast, and convenient.

They're backed by cities and counties through taxes and their convertability into one-year municipal bonds. With Munidollars, we are building a better municipal banking system for state and local American governments. These governments can make Munidollars and buyers can use them for investment and everyday commerce.

Unlike a traditional financial asset, Munidollars are directly registered with the city and don't have additional banking risk. This better technology will bring better local banking, which will improve our communities' economies.

tiles.title: Cities and Counties
tiles.content: Cut out the middle-men in municipal finance. Streamline your operations and investments.

tiles.title: Vendors and Suppliers
tiles.content: Lower transaction costs, lower financing costs, and shorten payment cycles.

tiles.title: Taxpayers
tiles.content: Bid for a discount on your taxes and help lower your community's financing costs.

tiles.title: Savers
tiles.content: Invest your money in your community. Get tax free interest and put your money where it matters.

about.title: About us
paragraphs: Flux is on a mission to make better money!

We are a pre-seed start-up building Munidollars by combining blockchain technology and existing regulatory frameworks. We want to build a better municipal banking system for local and state governments across the US.
